body.name: DeerValley Toilet, Elongated One Piece Toilet for Bathrooms, Comfortable Chair Seat Height 17", Dual Power Flush Toilet 1.1/1.6 GPF and MAP 900g, 12'' Rough-In Toilet Bowl
features: Luxurious Toilets for Bathrooms: Elongated one-piece toilet 27.63 x 15.13 x 30.75 inches, Elongated comfort height bowl for luxury and convenience.

Easy to Clean and Install: With concealed trapway, a Seamless One-piece toilet bowl is designed to stay clean and easy to wipe down. Offering a sleek look and easy cleaning. Two big installation access on the side allows the plumber to install this toilet much easier.

Powerful Siphon Flush Toilet: With Siphonic Flushing technology, the smart toilet has two flush options: full flush 1.6 Gpf, and light flush 1.1 Gpf. Great performance flush score of 900 grams and fully-glazed 2" trapway bring a super quiet and powerful flush with no clogs.

Soft Closing & Quick Release Seat: The modern toilet for bathrooms comes with a soft closing PP seat, which closes quietly and slowly. Avoiding any clattering when you use the tall toilet. The toilet seat also has a quick-release design, which is very easy to get the toilet seat off to tighten or clean.

After-Sales Service: We are committed to providing our customers with quality bathroom products and believe in the quality of our products. please feel free to email us through the platform, our toilets come with lifetime after-sales service and a 12-month warranty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Ultimate in Bathroom Comfort with DeerValley Why Choose DeerValley? Elongated Excellence: Our toilet boasts an elongated design, meticulously crafted to offer a spacious and comfortable seating area.Elevated Elegance: Designed with your well-being in mind, this 17" heightened seat is a game-changer for individuals seeking a comfortable, easy-to-use toilet that promotes better posture and effortless transitions. Elevate your bathroom experience today – choose DeerValley for unmatched comfort and sophistication.

Defend Your Space Our toilet for bathroom ingenious deep bowl design allows the depth of the water to act as a barrier, preventing microbes from easily proliferating in your toilet. Creating a healthier bathroom environment with this toilet. Pure Refreshment Experience a new level of bathroom refreshment with DeerValley's premium water filter. the filter ensures each flush delivers a burst of pure, revitalizing cleanliness.

Built to Last Fired at high temperatures, it is ultra-durable, guaranteeing a crack-free, reliable performance. – This Elongated Toilet promises unwavering durability and a future-proof investment in your bathroom. Stay Pristine The modern toilet resists the unsightly yellowing that often plagues traditional toilets. ensuring your bathroom stays effortlessly stylish and fresh over time.

What's in the package? The package comes included: toilet, soft closing toilet seat, high-quality wax ring, pre-installed flush valve, floor bolts, and installation instructions. Also with a supply line connector (adapter) for you to connect the supply line and toilet. Is it easy to install, or do I need professional help? Our toilet is designed with user-friendly installation in mind. It comes with detailed step-by-step instructions that make the process easy to follow, and our customer support team is ready to assist should you have any questions. Can you please confirm the dimensions of this toilet? I want to ensure it will fit properly before making a purchase. The dimensions of the toilet are 27.63 x 15.13 x 30.75 inches, 12'' Rough-In. Please measure your bathroom space to ensure a proper fit. feel free to share your measurements with us, and we'll be happy to assist you further. I'm curious about its flushing performance. Can you provide information about how effective the flush is? The toilet features an advanced dual flushing system that's optimized for effective waste removal and minimal clogs. Our engineering team has carefully designed the flushing mechanism 1.1/1.6 GPF to provide both power How durable is the toilet, and is it resistant to cracking or damage over time? Our toilet is fired at high temperatures during the manufacturing process, making it exceptionally durable and resistant to cracking. This ensures that your DeerValley toilet will remain structurally sound and reliable throughout its lifespan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Modern Clean Look
reviews.reviewText: Easy to to install, all the pieces were there. We had to move over our water connection 3" as the back of the toilet was very close to the existing connection. I'm very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars comes as advertised
reviews.reviewText: excellent toilet, comfortable, seating, powerful flush

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Space saver with dual flush capability!!
reviews.reviewText: I love this small, compact toilet. My original toilet had a hairline crack in the tank that caused a slow leak. I wanted a dual flush system to conserve water. Best decision I made while upgrading the second story floors. Small footprint provides more space. Will order again as I replace the other toilets in my home!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek & simple; very happy
reviews.reviewText: Excellent toilet. Love that it hides the ugly parts of a classic toilet and gives an overall clean, sleek look. Works well and no leaks. Clear instructions and everything you need for installation including the wax ring provided.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It is so easy to wipe down because of its sleek lines

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value with style and function
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for my small bathroom remodel. Great protective packaging! The delivery driver actually THREW it off his truck to the ground, and to my surprise there was NO DAMAGE 😃 to the toilet. It flushes very quietly, yet has no issue with “getting everything” the first time. At this price point, please don’t expect a high end lid for the seat. The slow close function works beautifully, but I’ll upgrade later from the lightweight plastic one provided.Oh, customer service was great too! Helped quickly with a little issue that was actually my handyman’s fault 👍. He somehow got debris in the supply line.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2021
reviews.reviewText: It fits so well into our small nyc bathroom and I don’t feel like there was any sacrifice on quality. 100% worth the wait and easy to install. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and small.
reviews.reviewText: We gave a very small bathroom and this toilet did not take up much space.
Perfect! Have been using this for several months now and could not be happier. The seat is comfortable, easy to clean, looks good, powerful but quiet, quick flush …very pleased with this.

reviews.reviewTitle: Smallest toilet available for tiny space
reviews.reviewText: I liked the small size and appearance.
Delivered on time, easy to instal, useful in a small space.
Very happy with this productAnd it looks great
I have a small bathroom this toilet fits perfectly and looks amazing
